description: Try our easy to follow Little Mixed Fruit Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Little Mixed Fruit Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease 8 holes of a medium muffin tray and line the bases with baking paper.
Heat butter and 1/2 cup firmly-packed brown sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until butter has melted. Remove from heat and cool.
Stir in finely grated rind of orange, orange juice and eggs and whisk until combined.
Stir in mixed dried fruit, almond meal, cinnamon, mixed spice and gluten-free baking powder.
Divide mixture between prepared muffin holes. Bake for 25 minutes or until cooked through. Stand for 10 minutes before turning out.
Serve with custard or cream, if desired.
